CustomField.description: Subscription term used to prorate eligible products by day or month. This has been set by your administrator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This relates to the 'Days on Project' Field when Editing Quote Lines Enter the # of Days for the Project Here This is a Managed Package Field and the Field Name is unable to be revised to 'Days on Project' which would be more suited to it's use in our Organization.
CustomField.label: Subscription Term
